programs.title:
Tour details

-        Discover the wonders of ancient Egypt on this tour 4-night in Cairo the capital of civilization, we will start in Cairo enjoy a day tour in Giza pyramids, the sphinx, the older step pyramids at Sakkara, and visit Memphis, one of the World Heritage Sites in the next morning see The Egyptian Museum and enjoy discovering the Coptic Cairo & Khan el-Khalil Bazaar. Then get ready for the tour to Citadel of Sultan Salah al-Din & Sultan Hassan Mosque & Madrasa (Islamic School) then Explore other Great Mosques around Refa'i Mosque & (Mahmoudia Mosque 1567)  with an Egyptologist guide


Highlights

·      Giza Pyramids & Sphinx, Sakkara and Memphis

·        The Egyptian Museum, old Cairo and Khan EL Khalili

·        Salah El-Din Citadel, Sultan Hassan Mosque & El Moez

Tour details

-        Discover the wonders of ancient Egypt on this tour 4-night in Cairo the capital of civilization, we will start in Cairo enjoy a day tour in Giza pyramids, the sphinx, the older step pyramids at Sakkara, and visit Memphis, one of the World Heritage Sites in the next morning see The Egyptian Museum and enjoy discovering the Coptic Cairo & Khan el-Khalil Bazaar. Then get ready for the tour to Citadel of Sultan Salah al-Din & Sultan Hassan Mosque & Madrasa (Islamic School) then Explore other Great Mosques around Refa'i Mosque & (Mahmoudia Mosque 1567)  with an Egyptologist guide

Highlights

·      Giza Pyramids & Sphinx, Sakkara and Memphis

·        The Egyptian Museum, old Cairo and Khan EL Khalili

·        Salah El-Din Citadel, Sultan Hassan Mosque & El Moez

 Itinerary

Day 1 -  Arrival Cairo-Welcome to Egypt

1.     Upon your arrival at Cairo International Airport, one of our representatives will meet and assist you to have a quick approval on your entry after finishing, he will transfer you in A.C vehicle to your hotel in Cairo. Open your eyes you are in Cairo the land of the real history, Overnight Cairo hotel.

Ø Optional tour

(Get picked up from your hotel to enjoy a delicious dinner then get transferred back to your hotel) 

 

Day 2-  The Giza pyramids, sphinx, Sakkara, Memphis

Ø After breakfast discovers one of the fabulous wonders of the world tour guide will pick you up from hotel on time where we going to drive to Giza pyramids area. Visit the three pyramids it is amazing to take rare photos of the pyramid and ride a camel then visit the sphinx,

Ø After oriental Lunch transfer to visit Memphis (Miet Rahina Mus.), then transfer to visit Saqqara area to visit Saqqara step Pyramid & EmHoteb Museum. after finishing your tour, we will transfer you back to your hotel, overnight in Cairo hotel.

Ø Optional tour

(After your interesting day tour, enjoy a delicious dinner then get transferred back to your hotel)  

 

Day 3- The Egyptian Museum, old Cairo & Khan El Khalili bazar

Ø After your delicious breakfast at your hotel Meet your tour guide in lobby, will pick you up from your hotel in Cairo, to visit The Egyptian Museum which is one of the most favorable tourist destinations in Egypt as it contains some of the largest ancient Egyptian collections including an extensive collection spanning from the Predynastic Period to the Greco-Roman Era. After lunch transfer to visit old Cairo, include Amr Mosque, Hanging Church &The Ben Ezra Synagogue 

Ø Continue to Visit the Khan El-Khalili Bazaar, one of the oldest bazaars in the Middle East after finishing your tour we will transfer you back to your hotel, Overnight Cairo hotel

Day 3- The Egyptian Museum, old Cairo & Khan El Khalili bazar

Ø After your delicious breakfast at your hotel Meet your tour guide in lobby, will pick you up from your hotel in Cairo, to visit The Egyptian Museum which is one of the most favorable tourist destinations in Egypt as it contains some of the largest ancient Egyptian collections including an extensive collection spanning from the Predynastic Period to the Greco-Roman Era. After lunch transfer to visit old Cairo, include Amr Mosque, Hanging Church &The Ben Ezra Synagogue 

Ø Continue to Visit the Khan El-Khalili Bazaar, one of the oldest bazaars in the Middle East after finishing your tour we will transfer you back to your hotel, Overnight Cairo hotel

Ø Optional tour

(Enjoy an oriental delicious dinner in Khan El Khalili area then get transferred back to your hotel)  

Day 4- Salah El-Din Citadel, Sultan Hassan Mosque & El Moez

Ø After your delicious breakfast at your hotel, we will start the visit to Mohamed Ali Mosque, Salah El-Din Citadel

Ø  After Lunch visit Sultan Hassan Mosque & Madrasa (Islamic School) then Explore the View of others Great Mosques around Refa'i Mosque & (Mahmoudia Mosque 1567). Continue to Visit the El Moez Street Which is considered the largest open-air museum of Islamic Archaeology, and a length of 1200 meters, Enter the street from the old door EL Futooh Gate Starts with EL Hakem Mosque then Sehamy House. after finishing your tour, we will transfer you back to your hotel, Overnight Cairo hotel

Ø Optional tour

(Get transferred to have an Egyptian specialty program in Nile Cruise with Tanoora show and Egyptian dinner)


Day 5-  Final departure

Ø Enjoy your breakfast. Then according to your flight departure time. Final departure to Cairo international airport with unique photos and unforgettable memories. Have a nice trip.

Package Includes

·        04 Nights Hotel Accommodations in 04-star Cairo Hotel Based on Bed and Breakfast Basis

·        Meet and assist service upon arrival & departure.

·        All transfers to/from airport _ hotel & all tours by a private air-conditioned vehicle.

·        01 Day the Giza pyramids, sphinx, Sakkara& Memphis with tour guide including oriental lunch

·        01 Day the Egyptian Museum, old Cairo & Khan El Khalili bazar with tour guide including oriental lunch

·         01 Day Salah El-Din Citadel, Sultan Hassan Mosque & El Moez with tour guide including oriental lunch

Price Excludes

•    International flight ticket

•     Entry Visa

•     Any optional tours.

·        Dinner on the first day

·        Dinner on the second day

·        Dinner on the third day

·        Dinner on the fourth day

•     Tipping (Gratuities for your tour guides and drivers)


Notes

·        This is an initial offer and may be change upon reservation
